doc.text: Rebuilds the current screen content. This causes <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/config/gui/ConfigScreenContent" method="buildGui" type="(net.minecraft.client.gui.screens.Screen,org.moddingx.libx.config.gui.ConfigScreenContent.ScreenManager,java.lang.String,java.util.function.Consumer<net.minecraft.client.gui.components.AbstractWidget>)void">#buildGui(Screen, ScreenManager, String, Consumer)</ref>  to be called again.

parameters.name: content
parameters.doc: The content to display on the sub screen.

parameters.name: inputChanged
parameters.doc: A consumer that is called with a new value whenever the input changes.

doc.summary: Provides access to some screen operations.
doc.text: Provides access to some screen operations. The methods in here must be used instead of the regular methods or the config won't get saved correctly.
